meanings.definition: Feeling of discomfort or anxiety in enclosed or crowded spaces.
meanings.sent1: The claustrophobic felt uneasy in the crowded elevator.
meanings.sent2: She experienced claustrophobic in the small, packed room.
meanings.sent3: The claustrophobic mouse avoided the tight maze.
meanings.sent4: The claustrophobic sensation enveloped her like a suffocating blanket.
meanings.sent5: The claustrophobic panic gripped him as the walls closed in.

meanings.definition: Relating to or suffering from claustrophobia.
meanings.sent1: The claustrophobic person avoided small rooms.
meanings.sent2: The elevator ride was claustrophobic for him.
meanings.sent3: The claustrophobic cat refused to enter the cramped box.
meanings.sent4: The claustrophobic atmosphere of the cave made her shiver.
meanings.sent5: The claustrophobic feeling made the room seem to shrink around him.
